snippet: The students have been accused of raping two female students from nearby Spelman College in Atlanta.
abstract: Four Morehouse College students--Chukwudi Ndudikwa, Malcolm Jamal Frank, Tevin Mgbo and Lucien Kidd--are accused of raping two female students from nearby Spelman College in Atlanta.
lead_paragraph: The students have been accused of raping two female students from nearby Spelman College in Atlanta.

headline.seo: Georgia: Four Morehouse College Students Face Sexual Assault Charges
headline.main: Georgia: Four Morehouse College Students Face Sexual Assault Charges
